scripts.migrate:latest: export $(cat .env | xargs) && npm run ts-node -- $npm_package_modulesUrls_knex migrate:latest $npm_package_knexfile
scripts.migrate:rollback: export $(cat .env | xargs) && npm run ts-node -- $npm_package_modulesUrls_knex migrate:rollback $npm_package_knexfile
scripts.migrate:down: export $(cat .env | xargs) && npm run ts-node -- $npm_package_modulesUrls_knex migrate:down $npm_package_knexfile
scripts.migrate:up: export $(cat .env | xargs) && npm run ts-node -- $npm_package_modulesUrls_knex migrate:up $npm_package_knexfile
scripts.seed:run: export $(cat .env | xargs) && npm run ts-node -- $npm_package_modulesUrls_knex seed:run $npm_package_knexfile
scripts.build:migrateANDSeed: npm run migrate:latest && npm run seed:run
scripts.all:build: npm run client:build && npm run ts:build && exit 1;
scripts.docker:command: npm run build:migrateANDSeed && npm run server:start
